comment._content: Thank you Caroline Starr....Did you also notice the name on the BOXES behind the fellows?  FOWX., photographer....Egbert Guy FOWX who worked for and with Andrew J Russell and on his own..I believe he had a "studio" in/near City Point( might be wrong). DTooley San Diego

comment._content: Thank you DJ. Yes, I made a note of that. There were some wonderful locomotive photos taken at City Point. I do not remember who took those. City Point was where the transports tied up, among other ships, is that correct?
